content.question: Angelo’s and The Creamery are the two ice cream shops open every Saturday in a certain town. Based on survey data, the town determined that there is a <math alttext="70 percent sign"><mn>70</mn><mo>%</mo></math> chance that a customer of Angelo’s will return to Angelo’s the following Saturday and a <math alttext="30 percent sign"><mn>30</mn><mo>%</mo></math> chance that a customer of Angelo’s will go to The Creamery the following Saturday. There is also a <math alttext="60 percent sign"><mn>60</mn><mo>%</mo></math> chance that a customer of The Creamery will return to The Creamery the following Saturday and a <math alttext="40 percent sign"><mn>40</mn><mo>%</mo></math> chance that a a customer of The Creamery will go to Angelo’s the following Saturday. The constant <math alttext="a subscript i"><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> gives the percent of customers who go to Angelo’s on a Saturday designated as the <math alttext="i th"><mi>i</mi><mtext>th</mtext></math>. The constant <math alttext="c subscript i"><msub><mi>c</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> gives the percent of customers who go to The Creamery on a Saturday designated as the <math alttext="i th"><mi>i</mi><mtext>th</mtext></math>.  Matrix <math alttext="M"><mi>M</mi></math> is a <math alttext="2 by 2"><mn>2</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>2</mn></math> transition matrix that is used to model these changes between ice cream shops such that <math alttext="M times a 2 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value a subscript n, row 2 column 1 value c subscript n end matrix equals a 2 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value a subscript n plus 1 end subscript, row 2 column 1 value c subscript n plus 1 end subscript end matrix"><mi>M</mi><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>a</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>c</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>a</mi><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mi>c</mi><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>.  Which of the following defines <math alttext="M"><mi>M</mi></math> ?
